Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is more a consistent reminder of mistakes I make while writing, teacher feedback is only available after submission and it's rare to notice the difference between assignments.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI, since it's not a person, has no emotional reaction for me. Teacher feedback is more negatively received as I have to speak and see the person who reviewed work of mine that may not be up to their standard.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback is more on the concept or assignment as a whole. If you ask GenAI what is wrong with the essay, it will only tell you logistical and syntax errors.
